sentences.en: About this time I met with an odd volume of the Spectator.
sentences.cn: 大约此时,我偶尔发现一卷残缺不全的《旁观者》报.

sentences.en: As a spectator, he had always enjoyed Lily Bart.
sentences.cn: 做为一名局外人, 他一向十分赏识这位丽莉·巴特.

sentences.en: He is always a spectator and doesn't work very hard.
sentences.cn: 他总在旁边观潮,不好好干活.

sentences.en: His mind seemed as passive as a spectator at a diorama.
sentences.cn: 他的心似乎象一位旁观者那样消极地看着一幅透视画.

sentences.en: I enjoy all kinds of sports, mainly as a spectator.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢各种体育运动, 以观看为主.

sentences.en: I took some of the tales in the Spectator, and turned them into verse.
sentences.cn: 我从《旁观者》中摘出一些故事, 把它们改成诗文.

sentences.en: She was a passive spectator of the operation of her fate.
sentences.cn: 在命运的主宰面前,她只能做一名消极的旁观者.

sentences.en: Show jumping as a spectator sport is increasingly on the map.
sentences.cn: 赛马跳栏这种很吸引观众的运动越来越受到大家的注意.

sentences.en: Sorry, I just like to watch almost all kinds of ball games. I'm strictly spectator.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 我仅仅喜欢观看几乎所有的球类比赛, 我是个十足的观众.
这场比赛吸引了四万多名观众。

sentences.en: The most popular spectator sport is football.
sentences.cn: 观赏性强、最受欢迎的体育运动是足球。

sentences.en: The role of a work is to communicate its message to the spectator.
sentences.cn: 一部艺术作品的作用在于把它的含义传达给观众.

sentences.en: Then I compared my Spectator with the original, discovered some of my faults, and corrected them.
sentences.cn: 然后,我就把自己写的《旁观者》同原作加以比较, 从中发现不足, 加以改正.

sentences.en: Through it all Richard Nixon moved as if he were himself a spectator, not the principal.
sentences.cn: 尼克松自始至终表现得象旁观者, 而不是主角.

sentences.en: We are continuing to explore spectator options for viewing Arena games.
sentences.cn: 我们会继续探索观看竞技场比赛的观察者选项.

words.tran_cn: 观众,观察家,游览者,旁观者,目击者

phrases.tran_cn: 吸引大量观众的体育运动

trans.tran_en: someone who is watching an event or game
